notes: Frontend refactor: Extracted 6,639 lines of inline JavaScript from index.html into 11 modular files (api.js, utils.js, auth.js, views.js, sync.js, music.js, extras.js, player.js, profiles.js, engagement.js, init.js). index.html reduced from 7,157 to 529 lines (HTML only). Service worker updated to cache new JS files.
